13799.<pc>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－参の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The copy of "Chosen's Teachings Book 3" in
your possession began to glow!

13800.白紙だったページに 文字が浮かびあがってくる。\n<pc>は その文字を読んだ。:
The blank pages are now filled with words.
<pc> began reading them.

13801.なんじゃ ここも見つかってしまったか。\n……まあよいわ。修行の続きといくぞ。\:
So you found this place, too? ...Oh well. Let us continue your training. Let's give a shock to the martial artist who relies on weapons
too much!

13802.この辺りをうろつく魔物 <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を\n素手で 倒してくる:
You must defeat a Trickstar, a monster
that roams this area, with your bare hands. No
weapons or shields are allowed!

13803.それと 聞きあきたかもしれんが 素手で倒したら\nその戦いを勝って終わらせなけれ:
And in case you're not tired of hearing this, once you pummel them to death with your bare hands, you have to win the fight for it to
count. So get out there and defeat <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of them!

13804.「やはり……。修行を進めていたのは\n ヤーン様ではなく あなたでしたか。:
As I suspected... it was you, not Master Yarn,
who was completing the training.

13805.「先日は ごあいさつできず 失礼しました。\n 私はヤーン様の従者 ガウラドと申:
I apologize for not greeting you properly the
other day. I am Gaurad, a follower of Master
Yarn. A pleasure to make your acquaintance.

13806.「きっと あなたは 何も知らされずに\n その修行を やっているのでしょうね。:
I am sure you are doing this training without
any idea of what it is you are actually doing.

13807.「超天道士の名を継ぐための修行を\n 他人にやらせるとは……。\n まったく ヤ:
I can't believe he would allow someone else to
do the training to inherit the title of Chosen
One... what is Master Yarn thinking?

13808.「私も超天道士にあこがれ 弟子入りを望んだ者。\n 代われるものなら 代わりたい:
I, too, became an apprentice in the hopes of
becoming the next Chosen One. I would take
your place, if I could...

13809.「いや 失礼しました……。\n それでは また お会いしましょう。: No, excuse me... we will see each other again.

13854.「<pc>殿が そのような顔をなさるのは\n 私のせいです ヤーン様。:
It is my fault that <pc> makes such a
face, Master Yarn.

13855.「ガウラド？ なんだ～ どういうことだ。\n 次の本を 持ってきてくれたんじゃな:
Gaurad? What are you talking about? Did you
bring me the next book?

13856.「私が 次の書を持ってきたとして\n その書の修行を果たすのは あなたではなく\:
If I brought you the next book, it would be
<pc>, not you, who would complete
the training within, wouldn't it?

13857.「あちゃ～。バレちまったのか～。: Ahh～, looks like I've been found out.

13858.「あなたは 伝説の武闘家である 超天道士様が\n その生涯で 唯一の弟子と認めた:
You are a legendary martial artist, the only
one whom the old Chosen One ever acknowledged
as a disciple in his entire life.

13859.「だというのに 超天道士様の死後\n あなたは 遊んでばかり……。:
And yet, ever since the death of the master,
all you ever do is play around...

13860.「そのあなたが ようやく\n 超天道士様の名を継ぐ覚悟を決めたのかと\n 私は:
I was overjoyed when I thought you had made up
your mind and decided to inherit the title of
Chosen One...

13861.「何度も 言ってきたはずだ。\n オレは超天道士の名になんか 興味ない。\n だ:
I told you plenty of times before, I'm not
interested in the Chosen One's title. That's
why I was having them do it instead.

13862.「悪いな～ <pc>。\n だますつもりじゃ なかったんだ。:
Sorry, <pc>. I didn't mean to
deceive you.

13863.「アンタは オレよりも 超天道士の名を継ぐのに\n ふさわしいヤツだと 思ったん:
I thought you were more worthy than me to
inherit the title of Chosen One.

13864.「それは まちがいです。\n あなたは <pc>殿を 大変なことに\n 巻き込ん:
You are mistaken. You have gotten
<pc> involved in a great amount of
trouble.

13865.「まちがい～？ 巻き込んだって 何にだよ？: Mistaken? What do you mean, involved?

13866.「このままでは 死にます。: If this continues, they will die.

13867.「はあ～？ なんで死ぬんだよ。: Huh? What do you mean, die?

13868.「次の書……最後の書の名は 死の書。\n 生きるか死ぬかの 死の文字を冠する書で:
The next and final book... is also known as
the Book of Death. It bears the ancient symbol
representing death.

13869.「だが 修行を進めているのは コイツだぜ～。\n ということは 死ぬのは コイツ:
But they're the one who's been doing the
training. Are you saying that they're going to
die?

13870.「そうです。<pc>殿は\n 超天遊戯の書の修行を 後戻りの\n できないところ:
Yes. <pc> has advanced their
training from the Chosen's Teachings Books to
the point of no return...

13871.「参の書までの修行を終えた <pc>殿は \n すでに 超天道士様のチカラの多く:
After completing the training in Book Three,
<pc> has attained a state where they
have acquired much of the Chosen One's power.

13872.「その状態の者が 最後の修行を果たせず\n 超天道士の名を継げなかった場合\n:
If such a person in that state fails to complete the final training and inherit the title of Chosen One, their body will not be
able to withstand that power...

13873.「行きつく先は……死あるのみ。\n <pc>殿が その運命から\n 逃れることは:
The only conclusion... will be death. There is
no way for <pc> to escape that fate.

13875.「……わかった。オレが なんとかする。\n 死の書をよこせ ガウラド。:
...Got it. I'll do something about it. Give me
the Book of Death, Gaurad.

13876.「私は持っていません。死の書が どこにあるかは\n ご自身で探されると よいでし:
I do not have it. You will have to find the
Book of Death yourself.

13877.「超天道士様の弟子である ヤーン様ならば\n 見つけるのは たやすいことかと。:
As the disciple of the former master, you
should have no trouble finding it, Master
Yarn.

13879.「今の話を 信じられないって顔してるな～。:
You look like you can't believe what you just
heard.

13880.「ガウラドは ウソをつかない男だ。\n なによりも あの超天道士の じ～さんなら:
Gaurad isn't the type of person to lie. More
than that, he's the kind of guy that would
have done anything for the old man.

13881.「ヤベ～。昔の記憶が よみがえってきやがる。\n オレも いろいろ ひで～目にあ:
Oh man, this is bringing back old memories.
I've been through a ton of horrible things
myself.

13882.「……まあ～ それは 置いといてだ。\n とにかく アンタには 修行を\n 続け:
...Well, that's for another time. Looks like
you've got no choice but to continue your
training.

13883.「いい装備がなきゃ きついかもしれね～。\n コレを 受け取っておいてくれ。:
It might be tough without good equipment.
Here, take this.

13884.「役に立つかは わからね～が\n コレを 受け取っておいてくれ。:
I don't know if this will help you, but here,
take it.

13885.「オレは 死の書を探してみる。\n 心当たりも あるっちゃ～ あるんだ。:
I'm going to look for the Book of Death. I
have an idea of where to start searching.

13886.「すぐに 見つけてくるからさ。\n 後で 武闘家になって また来てくれ。\n す:
I'll find it soon enough. Come back later as a
martial artist. Sorry about all this,
<pc>...

24451.「責任は ヤーン様にあるのですよ。\n 超天道士の名とは それほどに\n 重たい:
The responsibility for this lies with you,
Master Yarn. The title of Chosen One is one
that carries great weight.
